SS:  I NEVER TRAVEL ALONE!  IF I MUST RETURN HOME IT SHALL NOT BE 
WITHOUT A MAXIMAL SPARK!

He pulls harder on his whip and sends a blast of fire at Epyon's head 
(he's still in beast mode.) and he slammes his hind legs into Epyon's 
stomache and squeezes his talons.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He feels his whip make contact with some big internal part. The whip
> wraps around, and Epyon yanks. Some part of SS was about to come 
out, in
> a painful way. Plus the electricity from the whip should be searging
> through SS causeing overloads, and other damage.
> "One way or the other, your going down!" Yells Epyon.
